page.title: 14HOUSING IN SOUTH NORMANTON
page.content: We conducted a survey in{Pinxton}and S/N schools,into various aspects of housing.The main results were these {Type:}The most people{(60%)}(44%)live in semi-detached houses.The figures then differ thus:Bungalows{(11%)}(12%) Detached houses{(11%)}(30%),Terraced houses{(18%)}(11%),Caravan{(0%)}(1%), Business Premises(Pubs etc.){(0%)}(2%) {Age:}Most houses in Pinxton{(53%)}were over 50 years old but in Normanton the largest group(25%) were less than 10 years old.Other figures were:0-10years old (8%),11-20years{(13%)}(20%),21-30 years{(13%)}(16%),31-40years{(8%)} (9%), 41-50years{(6%)}(7%),over 50years (19%) {Ownership:}(Normanton only) Owner-occupied 81% Rented from Council 15% Rented from Landlord 4%
